text:
@brouhaha It's like the bs "we have xxxxx amount of traffic deaths in a year so what's the big" etc

not all in one country.
not in a month's time.

The numbers are surpassing the numbers from _all_three_world_wars_plus_Vietnam.

People cannot imagine such a thing, such  deathnumbers.
